title: Digital Literacy Enhancement Program Based on Biomedical Informatics Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Biomedical Terminology and Data Interpretation Skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening Competencies in Biomedical Data Visualization and Analysis in Mobile Device-Centric Limited Environments

learning_goals: Learners can interpret biomedical imaging data in a 3D VR environment with 90% accuracy
Learners can explain three or more stages of physiological changes over time in patient diagnosis scenarios using multimedia tools
Learners achieve at least 80% proficiency in solving biomedical informatics problems through formative assessments within the module

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
